taxonomy.title: Cultural Group
taxonomy.description: This facet describes the culture(s) associated with an object (who created or used it, or is depicted). The organization combines general geographic range with cultural groupings.
taxonomy.notes: While cultures tend to be associated with location, the range of a culture does not neatly match political boundaries.

heading.title: East Side of San Joaquin Tribal Name Uncertain
